title: Synopsys | R&D Engineer I | Offcampus
content:
Education: BTech Computer Science Tier I
    Years of Experience: 0
    Prior Experience: 6 months interned at reputed MNCs
	Date of the Offer: September 2024
    Company: Synopsys
    Title/Level: R&D Engineer I
    Location: Bangalore, India
    Salary: 15.5 LPA
    Signing Bonus: 3 LPA (2 year bond)
	Relocation Bonus: 50 k
    Stock bonus: None (15% discount on stock price if you want to purchase)
    Performance Bonus: 1.24 LPA
    Benefits: 3.3 LPA (Includes Lunch & Snacks, Health Management Program, Mediclaim Hospitalization Insurance, Personal Accident Cover, Group Life Insurance Cover, Interest Free Loan Subsidy, Annual Leave Encashment)
	Total Compensation (Salary + Bonus + Stock + Benefits): 23.55 LPA
    Other details: Very Flexible Work-Life Balance; 15 paid Annual Leaves, 10 paid Casual Leaves, 15 paid Sick Leaves, 10 paid Calendar Holiday

title: Google India | SWE L3 |Bangalore
content:
Education: 2020 grad
Years of Experience: ~4 YOE
Prior Experience: US megacap company
Current Compensation: 18 LPA + 31L RSUs (11.8L + 11.8L + 4.7L + 2.7)

Date of the Offer: Sep 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 23.5 LPA
Relocation Bonus: yet to be disclosed
Signing Bonus: Nil
Stock bonus: 45.5K USD ~ 37L (38%, 32%, 20%, 10%)
Bonus: 15% ~ 3.5L

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):
Benefits: 23.5 + 2.35 (10%) + 14 = 39.85L
Other details: Standard Google benefits.

Tried to negotiate (no offers at hand), Recruiter increased Base, decreased stocks and removed sign on bonus.

Interview: https://leetcode.com/discuss/comment/2678028

Gave interviews at Microsoft for SWE 2, interview co-ordinator mentioned all rounds are positive. Got to know my recruiter went on maternity leave and things are not moving. Need help here, only few days left for Google joining.
